thread.title: How It Should've Sounded: Metallica Shares Grammys Rehearsal Footage, 0 Technical Issues Included [News]
thread.title_full: How It Should've Sounded: Metallica Shares Grammys Rehearsal Footage, 0 Technical Issues Included [News]

title: How It Should've Sounded: Metallica Shares Grammys Rehearsal Footage, 0 Technical Issues Included [News]
text:
Posted 14 hours ago 8 
Metallica shared pro-shot footage of their " Moth Into Flame " Grammys rehearsal with Lady Gaga, essentially showcasing what the show would have looked and sounded like without the technical issues that ruined the live performance. 
The boys noted: "Mic Into Flame? OK, our little Grammy... hiccup... wasn't that dramatic. But it still left all of us wondering 'what if?' To answer that question and do justice to what we felt was an inspiring collaboration, we decided to share footage from earlier that day when all cylinders were firing just right." 
You can check out the footage below ( not available in every country ), or via official site here .
